divs: Sighting DetailsOn lawn at cottage with telescope to look at stars when one of our party said look at that bright object. Enough time elapsed for two other sslook at and locate the comet or meteor enter the atmosphere. It reminded two of us of an observation when driving to Cedar Point Ohio several year ago.to
Summary: evening sky looking north over pine lake. 3 people observed comet with tail enter atmosphere.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Plainwell
There were no other sightings in Plainwell on or around July 9th 2012
